title: Neon Finance
description: A futuristic fintech dashboard visualizing crypto assets with real-time WebSocket data. Features include live price tracking, portfolio analytics, and a customizable dark mode interface.

title: Cyber Commerce
description: Headless e-commerce platform built for high-performance scale and glassmorphism UI. Includes advanced filtering, search, and a seamless checkout experience.
projectIcon: <svg viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' class='bg-icon-svg' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='1' d='M16 11V7a4 4 0 00-8 0v4M5 9h14l1 12H4L5 9z' /></svg>

title: Aether Chat
description: Decentralized messaging protocol focusing on privacy and zero-knowledge encryption. Ensures secure communication without central servers.
projectIcon: <svg viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' class='bg-icon-svg' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='1' d='M8 12h.01M12 12h.01M16 12h.01M21 12c0 4.418-4.03 8-9 8a9.863 9.863 0 01-4.255-.949L3 20l1.395-3.72C3.512 15.042 3 13.574 3 12c0-4.418 4.03-8 9-8s9 3.582 9 8z' /></svg>

title: Orbital Dash
description: Real-time multiplayer space racing game running entirely in the browser with WebGL. Features procedural generation and physics-based movement.
